lead_paragraph: Burnley bucked the modern trend when they reacted to relegation from the Premier League by keeping faith with their manager and holding on to the majority of their squad and that decision looks set to pay an immediate dividend.

headline.print_headline: Old-Fashioned Values Keep Burnley on Course for Success
headline.main: Old-Fashioned Values Keep Burnley on Course for Success

snippet: Burnley bucked the modern trend when they reacted to relegation from the Premier League by keeping faith with their manager and holding on to the majority of their squad and that decision looks set to pay an immediate dividend....
